author: Bhuvaneshwari S.
title: Migrant workers stranded at the border
description: 95 people spent two nights on the road before being given temporary shelter
content: As many as 95 people all migrant workers and their children from Prakasam and Visakhapatnam districts of Andhra Pradesh and Malkangiri district of Odisha, who were working in Karnataka, have been spending the past few days at a temporary shelter at Madhugiri … [+2195 chars]
